title: #161 - Papa John Ate 40 Pizzas In 30 Days & Is Going Insane
description:
On this episode of The H3 Podcast we discuss Papa John's bizzare interview where he reveals he has eaten over 40 pizzas in 30 days, TI's damage control with the Smith family, putting Shoenice back in the shoebox, MarkMcGrath's epic Cameo, jewel heists, Deer Hunting, and a whole lot more!
  New limited time merch - https://h3h3shop.com/
  Papa John's interview - https://www.wdrb.com/news/wdrb-video/as-papa-john-s-moves-on-without-its-founder-john/video_3b3f707d-3f43-5519-974c-9965c6ec3aac.html
  Mark McGrath's breakup Cameo - https://twitter.com/slasherdaysaint/status/1198622798027067394?s=12
  Star Wars teaser - https://twitter.com/starwars/status/1198955861743325184
  Imgur of stolen jewels - https://imgur.com/a/YPtPYHQ
  TI interview - https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=1803664559768440
  DJ Khaled tries to crowd surf - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v9pTnbkZ2SM
  Rob Schneider grabs Howie's hands - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5PEZ1tzaUdQ&feature=emb_title
itunes:author: Ethan Klein

On this episode of The H3 Podcast we discuss Papa John's bizzare interview where he reveals he has eaten over 40 pizzas in 30 days, TI's damage control with the Smith family, putting Shoenice back in the shoebox, MarkMcGrath's epic Cameo, jewel heists, Deer Hunting, and a whole lot more!
